message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $18,000. I believe it offers exceptional value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I'm motivated to sell, $10,000 is significantly below its value. Could you do $15,000?
I'm getting closer to your price, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $12,500. Can you meet me there?
